attributes.title: #freebarrontrump2020
attributes.review: Shawty’s👩🏾like a melody🎵in my head 🧠that i can’t keep out❌got me singing like✍️nananana👄everyday😿like my iPod📱 stuck in replay🔄

attributes.title: TERRIFIED!
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app, someone came into my house, dragged me outside and threw me in a dumpster. That might be unrelated but i still don’t like the app!

attributes.title: no thank you!
attributes.review: don’t get this app my phone was glitching like crazy thanks to this cheeto president. anyways. he’s an embarrassment to the U.S. anyone but trump 2020.

attributes.title: A war crime
attributes.review: First of all when I was downloading this app I thought it was subway surfers... turns out I was gravely mistaken.

attributes.title: Gross 🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking I could help support our incredibly racist president 🤗☺️🧚‍♂️but instead I got this?!🤬😡 Disappointed

attributes.title: my wife left me after i downloaded
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app thinking that my relationship would be all fixed with my wife.
my wife said that she no longer loved me 💔 
she left right after i downloaded this cursed apps. she took the kids with her 👎
now i will never find love again. this app is a home wrecker 🤡 your wife, your kids, they’ll all leave you. my own mother disowned me. 
my sleep paralysis demon no longer haunts me every night at the end of my bed 😔
0/10 worst dating app ever

attributes.title: was not a fan
attributes.review: the first thing i saw when i opened the app was trumps face 🤮 it was a enough time scar me and i did not enjoy my app experience. i was excited to support our president but then realized that was the very last thing i wanted to do. i will never be voting for this man

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This is just bad 😜🧚🏻I think that our Cheeto needs to stick to one thing

attributes.title: Glitchy. Horrible. Useless.
attributes.review: Wasted my time of this app. Wouldn’t recommend to anyone.
